name: v1.3.0
body:
## Changes

## ‚ö†Ô∏è‚ö†Ô∏è‚ö†Ô∏è Breaking change

From now on values in secrets will need to be quoted. For instance, if you had in your `.secrets` file:

```
my_secret=my_value
```

it will need to be changed to:

```
my_secret='my_value'
```

## üêõ Bug Fixes

- fix: treat secrets like a toml to simplify parsing and support special characters @dbarrosop (#736)
- fix: apply seeds automatically if .nhost folder didn't exist previously @dbarrosop (#737)

## üß∞ Maintenance

- chore: bump nhost/dashboard to 0.17.20 @nhost-build (#733)

name: v1.0.5
body:
## What's Changed
* chore: fix typo by @dbarrosop in https://github.com/nhost/cli/pull/708
* Fix: typo by @xlanex6 in https://github.com/nhost/cli/pull/711
* feat: allow specifying subdomain when working with remote environments by @dbarrosop in https://github.com/nhost/cli/pull/713
* feat: download metadata after starting services by @dbarrosop in https://github.com/nhost/cli/pull/717

## New Contributors
* @xlanex6 made their first contribution in https://github.com/nhost/cli/pull/711

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/nhost/cli/compare/v1.0.4...v1.0.5
